attributes.action: Ensure that all airlines provide seats with extra legroom (which are not emergency seats) so that people with disabilities who are unable to fit in the normal seats can take advantage of the cheaper short haul flights like other people.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
While some larger aircraft have seats with extra legroom,the smaller ones only have the emergency seats,which disabled people are not allowed to use. a lot of these airlines fly from the smaller regional airports,which are more convenient to get to,and easier to negotiate for disabled people.New legislation is coming in in july 08,we must ensure that the new rules don't get 
ignored by the airlines.
